entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
